name: Fracture (itch) (Amber R.)
description:
A short story made in RPG Maker for Friendship Jam.

Sapphire's island is falling apart, she can't stay there anymore. It's time to leave, for real. It's going to be difficult, but maybe it'll work out.

There are no secret endings or alternate paths. Only slight dialogue changes at best.
Playtime is ~10 minutes. It is a simple, quick story.

Made for friendship jam, tho it may not be obvious until later in the game why I consider friendship important to this game.

controls:
arrow keys - movement
z/enter - select
x/esc - menu

If I left out any important information, such as content warnings or anything else, please let me know.
